info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Allen, northeastern Wells, northern Adams, western Putnam, southern Defiance, Paulding and Van Wert Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Antwerp to near Monroeville to near Ossian. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Wayne, New Haven, Van Wert, Decatur, Delphos, Ossian, Paulding, Antwerp, Kalida, Woodburn, Monroeville, Payne, Continental, Convoy, Ottoville, Oakwood, Middletown, Middlebury, Preble and Zanesville. This includes Interstate 469 between mile markers 1 and 2, between mile markers 4 and 6, and between mile markers 9 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Indiana...and northwestern and west central Ohio.
